name: Autograpnel
description: Battery-powered compressor firing grapnel hook up to 20m high. Pulls up to 100kg. Battery good for 20 uses.

name: Backpack
description: Large external-frame backpack. Keeps hands free. Allows carrying STR x 5 kg in normal gravity.

name: Climbing Kit
description: Pitons, 100m fine rope, hammers, carabiners. Grants DM+2 to Athletics checks while climbing.

name: Cold Weather Clothing
description: Lightweight body suit with hood and face cover. Battery-powered internal heating. Takes no damage under Arctic (-25°C), 1D/2 hours under Martian (-50°C).

name: Compact Rations
description: Complete self-heating meal in serving tray. Quality varies from palatable to gourmet. Activates in 30 seconds.

name: Diving Gear
description: Flexible warm wetsuit, fins, goggles, air tank and regulator. Requires Athletics (strength). Adds 25% to underwater speed.

name: Flares (set of 6)
description: Signal flares seen by anyone with line of sight for long distances.

name: Goggles
description: Photosensitive auto-darkening goggles. Automatically protects against bright light and laser blinding.

name: Large Inflatable Shelter
description: Houses up to 8 people. Four sleeping rooms, common room, work/storage rooms, freshers.

name: Small Inflatable Shelter
description: Houses up to 4 people comfortably. Two sleeping rooms, common room, storage, fresher.

name: Pressure Tent, Small
description: Hemispherical 2m radius inflatable with airlock. Life support for 12 person-days. Self-assembling. Powered by solar panel.

name: Pressure Tent, Large
description: 4m width x 10m length hemispherical. Life support for 120 person-days. Self-assembling.

name: Respirator
description: Air filter mask for breathing protection. Filters must be changed every 6-12 hours. Grants DM+1 to END checks for atmospheric taints.

name: Respirator Replacement Filter
description: Replacement filter for respirator mask. Duration 6-12 hours depending on air quality.

name: Thermal-Visual Camouflage
description: Smart camouflage blanket with thermal regulation. Breaks thermal signature and applies colour matching. Grants DM+6 to Stealth if stationary, DM+1 if moving.

name: Water Purifier
description: Battery-operated micro-filter and chemical treatment. Purifies natural water and recycles biological waste water.

name: Basic Tool Kit
description: Small hand tools (wrenches, pliers, screwdrivers). Allows basic mechanical tasks without penalty.

name: Electronic Repair Tools
description: Specialized kit for electronics and photonics. Connects to Link phone for processing.

name: Construction Tools
description: Hammers, saws, squares, hatchets, chisels, woodworking tools. Essential for colonists.

name: Excavating Tools
description: Picks, shovels, mattocks. Essential for colonists and homesteaders.

name: Locksmith Kit (DM+0)
description: Tools for picking mechanical locks. Illegal in many places without license. Allows Mechanic skill use for locks.

name: Locksmith Kit (DM+2)
description: Superior lock picking tools. Higher bonus to Mechanic checks.

name: Locksmith Kit (DM+4)
description: Professional-grade lock picking tools. Maximum effectiveness.

name: Vehicle Maintenance Tools
description: Torque wrenches, grease guns, calibration tools. Grants DM+1 to Mechanic checks on vehicles and aircraft.

name: Power Hand Tools
description: Rechargeable power tools (chainsaw, jigsaw, rotary saw, drill). Includes 2 battery packs.

name: Spinner
description: Creates carbon monofilament line (0.1mm) supporting 1000kg. Line can slice through limbs. 2000m spool. Ignores non-rigid armour.

name: Stik-Kit, Red (10g holding)
description: Disposable adhesive patch using van der Waals force. Reusable via small battery. Can adhere to almost anything except PTFE.

name: Stik-Kit, Orange (100g holding)
description: Colour-coded adhesive patch. 100g holding strength.

name: Stik-Kit, Yellow (1kg holding)
description: Colour-coded adhesive patch. 1kg holding strength.

name: Stik-Kit, Green (10kg holding)
description: Colour-coded adhesive patch. 10kg holding strength.

name: Stik-Kit, Blue (100kg holding)
description: Colour-coded adhesive patch. 100kg holding strength.

name: Tous-Outils, Light
description: Multi-tool with flexible head auto-adjusting to fastener size. For light vehicles. Grants DM+1 to Mechanic checks.

name: Tous-Outils, Medium
description: Multi-tool for medium vehicles. Grants DM+1 to Mechanic checks.

name: Tous-Outils, Heavy
description: Multi-tool for heavy vehicles. Grants DM+1 to Mechanic checks.

name: Binoculars
description: Standard optical binoculars for viewing distant objects.

name: Large Life Form Detector
description: IR sensor detecting warm life forms. 100m range. DM+1 to Recon checks.

name: SCEMS (Superconducting Electromagnetic Sensor)
description: Detects radio-frequency activity and electrical devices. 1000m range. Can be shielded against.

name: Imager
description: Professional camera for detailed photography and video. 24-hour storage on internal media. Includes GPS and Link connection.

name: Portable Lab
description: Specialized lab for one scientific field (archaeology, biology, chemistry, physics, planetology, xenobiology). Grants DM+1 to research checks.

name: Remote Meteorological Station
description: Monitors rainfall, humidity, pressure, wind. Records data on memory chip. For every 10 deployed, DM+1 to climate checks (max DM+4).

name: Sampling Kit
description: Shoulder-strap kit for field samples of soil, minerals, plants, or gas atmosphere.

name: Lightweight Autodoc
description: Portable medical unit. Boosts healing 4x and adds DM+1 to Medic checks. Can operate with Medic 2 and INT/DEX+1.

name: Medkit
description: Portable first aid kit with spray bandages, dressings, tools, autoinjector vials (antishock, antitoxin, antibiotic, stimulant, anaesthetic).

name: Static Autodoc
description: Permanent hospital/starship ward unit. Boosts healing 6x and adds DM+2 to Medic checks. Requires skilled operator or Medic 2/INT10/DEX10.

name: Link Phone
description: Advanced communication device and mini-computer. Serves as computer/1, camera, flashlight, recorder, GPS. Range 5km in city. Includes 4D sensor suite.

name: Hand Communicator
description: Battery-powered radio handheld. Has voice recorder and transponder. Can relay video/data. 20 km range.

name: Backpack Communicator
description: Heavier radio version. Can relay data and video. 200 km range. Links to vehicle power or portable supply.

name: Tight Beam UpLink
description: Directional communication with satellites/stations. Very narrow beam. Difficult to intercept.

name: Assistive Exoskeleton - Load-Bearing
description: Helps with mobility. Allows 50% more carrying without fatigue. No STR bonus but supports mobility-impaired.

name: Assistive Exoskeleton - STR+2
description: Grants STR+2 enhancement. 4-hour power duration.

name: Assistive Exoskeleton - STR+4
description: Grants STR+4 enhancement. 2-hour power duration.

name: Assistive Exoskeleton - STR+6
description: Grants STR+6 enhancement. 1-hour power duration.
